arts.ttl: Manchester United vs Chelsea – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Old Trafford stages a marquee Premier League fixture on Saturday as a Manchester United side in crisis host unbeaten Chelsea. The match pits two clubs in contrasting form against each other. United are enduring their worst start to a Premier League season since 1992/93 and sit 14th, while Chelsea are one of only three unbeaten […] The post Manchester United vs Chelsea – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: €4.37b spent, no league titles - Why Man Utd and Chelsea are England's underachieving giants
arts.sum: Manchester United take on Chelsea in the Premier League on Saturday afternoon in a match that could truly go either way. Although this fixture may have been considered a clash of titans once upon a...

arts.ttl: Saturday’s briefing: No pontiff-icating from Ruben Amorim ahead of Chelsea clash
arts.sum: The under-fire United boss suggested even the Pope could not make him change his approach.

arts.ttl: Man Utd vs. Chelsea: Preview, Predictions and Lineups
arts.sum: The pressure is mounting on Ruben Amorim as the Blues come to town.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim makes defiant Bruno Fernandes vow ahead of crunch Chelsea clash
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim has vowed to keep playing Man Utd skipper Bruno Fernandes in a deeper midfield role, rather than his favoured attacking position further up the pitch

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca ‘appreciates’ the ‘struggle’ of Ruben Amorim at Man United
arts.sum: “It's always difficult to play Man United away in their stadium Old Trafford . Man United are under pressure to bounce back from a derby day defeat, and the Italian "appreciates" the situation they face.

arts.ttl: Chelsea make Romeo Lavia transfer decision after Man Utd approach
arts.sum: The 21-year-old is extremely highly-rated and “loved” at Chelsea, as per TBR Football, and the club still fully believe in him as a player, despite the plethora of injury issues he has suffered over the past two years. Several other unnamed clubs are also interested in agreeing a January deal for Lavia, despite his injury troubles, and the 21-year-old is therefore expected to be the subject of a number of enquiries during the winter transfer window.

arts.ttl: Chelsea Predicted Lineup vs. Man Utd: Garnacho to Start on Old Trafford Return
arts.sum: The Blues were disappointing in midweek and changes may be rung by Enzo Maresca.

arts.ttl: Man Utd Predicted Lineup vs. Chelsea: Amorim Under Pressure to Deliver
arts.sum: The Red Devils have won just once in all competitions this season.

arts.ttl: Enzo Maresca believes Alejandro Garnacho is ‘ready to start’
arts.sum: “ Estevao can be great in all the attacking positions because his talent is very good his top player but at the same time is 17 18 years old so he needs a little time. The other day against Bayern Munich, Marc Cucurella, every time touched the ball, the noise was not the best, but you have to learn to handle these kinds of things.”
